data.name: Blood Field Demo
data.detailed_description:
About This Game:

Have you ever heard horror stories from your grandma? Bloody Field will bring that memory back to you. Explore a sinister world in an environment based on Vietnamese culture and a storyline inspired by Vietnamese myths and folklore. Bloody Field is a first-person horror game where you play as Minh - who accidentally discovered a terrible hidden truth about the tragic death of a young lady. The game is set in a field where horrific things happened. How will the killer get the ending?

Features:

Vietnamese Horror - The environment is based on a horrific Vietnamese setting and the narrative is inspired by Vietnamese myths.
Diversity of Gameplay – Puzzles and investigations are integrated into the game for a variety of gameplay.

data.short_description: Vietnamese Horror - The environment is based on a horrific Vietnamese setting and the narrative is inspired by Vietnamese myths.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
